( 1000 SQ-U 3000 SQ-U give serious adverse event . ) New regimen : 1000 SQ-U , 3000 SQ-U , 3000 SQ-U .
DOC.detailed_description: 40 patient seasonal allergic rhinitis recruit . Study subject randomize intralymphatic injection placebo ALK Alutard 5-grasses birch . Injections give 4-5 ( -7 ) week interval .
DOC.criteria: Seasonal allergic symptom birch and/or grass verify skin prick test , Accepted inform consent Pregnancy nursing Autoimmune collagen disease ( know ) Cardiovascular disease Perennial pulmonary disease Hepatic disease Renal disease Cancer Any medication possible sideeffect interfere immune response Previous immuno chemotherapy Chronic diseases Other upper airway disease ( nonallergic sinusitis , nasal polyp , chronic obstructive restrictive lung disease ) Disease condition render treatment anaphylactic reaction difficult ( symptomatic coronary heart disease , severe arterial hypertension treatment Î²blockers ) Major metabolic disease Known suspect allergy study product Alcohol drug abuse Mental incapability cop study Withdrawal inform consent
